trans_title: 最后的冻原：冻原传人的故事
introduction: This 4-part documentary series portrays the lives of the people in tundra where they endure one of the world’s most inhospitable environments. The images of their way of life may motivate viewers who live in modern cities to reevaluate their values in a way that can help save the planet’s threatened ecosystem. Bringing vivid images of the lives of Nenets children, who display a maturity beyond their years. Their traditional way of life that emphasizes harmony with nature will reacquaint viewers with basic values that have been lost in modern human societies.
chinese_title: 最后的冻原：冻原传人的故事
